By Zilk the Rank S Master on Friday, November 6, 2009 - 04:25 am:

I just tried to enter my id/pw and it says message from webpage then a bunch of squares b id is that normal?

By Lisa Shock on Friday, November 6, 2009 - 09:42 am:

Did it look like a windows error message, a pop-up box? If so, that means that your ID works:

"Already, it is ID which applies to the preceding Î&#146; test."

The issue is that you are seeing squares instead of kana. You need to change your computer's language setting or at least go into your browser and change the character encoding. (View, Character Encoding, Japanese) You want to see Japanese writing on tabs and in forms.

By Zilk the Rank S Master on Wednesday, November 25, 2009 - 06:34 am:

How do I install the game? when I hit the button after it is done nothing happens.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, November 25, 2009 - 09:02 am:

Hit what button?

You use the download game button to download it. You'll be asked where to save it.

You then go to wherever you saved it on your computer and double click to start the installation. My computer squawked because it was an unknown publisher, but I accepted it.

You'll see a window for Install Wizard, let that run. Then a window for Windows Installer, let that run. Each of those has one button on it, the CANCEL button. Do not click that.

By Zilk the Rank S Master on Wednesday, November 25, 2009 - 09:07 am:

The button I mean comes after it finishes and is just a bunch of random letters and symbols, it might just be an error

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, November 25, 2009 - 09:14 am:

You need to reset your computer's language to Japanese.

Once Windows Installer starts the real install, you want to select the middle button, with an (N) on it for most choices. You'll be asked to accept, A, or decline, D, the privacy policy. You'll also be asked where you want the install, and you can choose standard or custom.

On the last screen the check mark means launch now, and the F stands for Finish.

There may be stuff going on tonight, remember that they are a day ahead of us.

By Zilk the Rank S Master on Wednesday, November 25, 2009 - 09:18 am:

By Zercker on Saturday, November 28, 2009 - 10:02 am:

What did you do to your display settings to make the window quit popping up?

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, November 28, 2009 - 10:14 am:

In XP, you go to control panel and select regional settings. In the little box you select Japanese, THEN you go to advanced settings and also select Japanese.

By SilverTwilight on Saturday, November 28, 2009 - 10:34 am:

I had to change the options in the game so that it matched my current resolution (as close as possible, anyway. I'm on a widescreen, so I set the game options to the max resolution). So if your screen is 1024x768, then you need to set the game to that, too.

Never made it into the game, the launcher would disappear without the client starting.
